message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start!
Your share loses value much faster than mine, Alice. I propose a 55-45 split in my favor to reflect this.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this 52-48 split before the money shrinks even further.
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, but that's as low as I'll go.
Alice, this is more than fair considering how quickly your share is shrinking. I won't go any lower.
